Method Detail

update

public void update(UndirectedGraph graph,
                   Vertex root)
Description copied from class: Visualization
show the specified graph, with its root vertex.
The vertices of the graph have to have special ID numbers: they have to be durchnummeriert form 0 to n-1, where n is the number of vertices in the graph.

Specified by:
update in class Visualization
Parameters:
graph - - UndirectedGraph to be shown
root - - the root vertex of the graph
See Also:
Visualization.update(de.aitools.iv.graphdrawing.datastructures.graph.UndirectedGraph, de.aitools.iv.graphdrawing.datastructures.graph.Vertex)
